Apr 30, 2025

President Donald Trump had quite a day on Tuesday, from saying it'd be fun to be pope to holding a rally in Michigan to eating an ABC News reporter alive.

The interviewer, Terry Moran, found himself at odds with the president at just about every turn. Here's their exchange about former President Joe Biden's mental and physical capabilities:
